mdRecord.dcterms:description: This is a drawing pad with several sketches. The front cover includes the handwritten note, "Nannie E. Walker, Nov. 15, 1916, H. M. C. Blank pages have not been scanned. There is also a handwritten note: "8/7/07. Nannie Elizabeth Walkers art book, Nov. 16, 1916. Hartshorn Memorial College, on campus of Virginia Union University, 1500 Lombard[y] Street, Richmond, VA.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Nannie Walker's Art Book, November 15, 1916
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Art
Drawing
Sketchbooks
